敚字的基本解释

敚
duó
古同“夺”，强取：“百姓既相抄敚，敬儿至江陵诛攸之亲党。”
姓。

敚
duì
古通“对”，答对。

敚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duó］
［《廣韻》徒活切，入末，定。］
“奪1”的古字。“捝3”的被通假字。“敓1”的新字形。亦作“1”。
(1)强取；夺取。
(2)引申为取胜。
(3)失去。参见“敚魄”。
(4)更替；改变。
(5)通“對”。对答。

敚字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【攴字部】　敚； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页472第05
【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?徒活切，音捝。【說文】彊取也。周書曰：敚攘矯虔。○按書呂?今本作奪攘。　又姓。見【廣韻】。　【說文】从攴作敚。敚字原从攴作。

敚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
敚字的起名意思

暂无。

Wei
Basic explanation of words
Wei
duó
Gu Tong "captured" and forcibly took: "The people copied each other, and Jinger went to Jiangling to punish the party."
name.
Wei
duì
Gutong is "right" and the answer is correct.
Wei
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duó］
["Guangyun" lively, enters the end, and settles. ]
The ancient word "Capture 1". "捝3" was passed falsely. The new glyph of "敓1". Also called "1".
(1) Forcibly seize; seize.
(2) The extension is to win.
(3) Lost. See "Xipao".
(4) Replacement; change.
(5) Through "right". Answer.
Wei
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Jixia] [Department of Characters] 　敚; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 472 05
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Only lively and sound. 【Said the text】Forced to take too. Zhou Shu said: He is very pious. ○According to the book Lu? This is the present version.　Another last name. See [Guangyun].　【Said the text】From Yi to Zhuo. The original character was written from Wei.
Wei
